## RequestBuilders.BaseRequestBuilder.withAuthorizationHeader() method

Sets the `Authorization` header of the request.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
withAuthorizationHeader(value: () => Promise<string>): this;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | () =&gt; Promise&lt;string&gt; | A callback that returns the value for the header |
